item.description:
Highly recommended that you buy a ticket in advance, I just bought mine, here is the link:  http://brattlefilm.org/2011/04/10/the-dark-side-of-oz/

Tickets $10 / $8 Student, Seniors, Brattle Members | Passes OK

We’ve heard about it but we’ve never tried it here: the infamous synchronization between the Hollywood classic THE WIZARD OF OZ and Pink Floyd’s Dark Side Of The Moon. Well, it’s about time. For one screening only, we’ll be presenting our own version of this classic mash-up, remixing the film’s original dialogue with Pink Floyd’s original songs as well as some unconventional cover versions.
item.how_to_find_us: Not really a group event, but posting to see if people want to join me - l look like my picture. I will try to sit in the middle of the theater.
item.why: Because both the Wizard of Oz and Dark Side of the Moon are awesome! And they really do sync up, I've tried it.
item.name: Wizard of Oz/Dark Side of the Moon Mashup at the Brattle!
